Description: Cellulitis is a bacterial skin infection that can occur when bacteria enter a break in the skin. It often causes redness
Remedy1: Keep the affected area clean and dry
column8: Use antibiotics as prescribed by a doctor
column9: Apply warm compresses to the affected area

Description: Impetigo is a highly contagious bacterial skin infection characterized by red sores that can rupture and form honey-colored crusts.
Precaution1: Avoid close contact with infected individuals
Remedy2: Keep the sores clean and covered

Description: Athlete's foot is a fungal infection that affects the skin on the feet
Nail fungus (onychomycosis) is a fungal infection that affects the nails
column10: Apply tea tree oil or other natural remedies

Description: Ringworm is a fungal infection that can affect the skin
column10: Keep the affected area clean and dry
column12: Take oral antifungal medications as prescribed

Description: Cutaneous larva migrans is a skin condition caused by parasitic larvae in the skin
Remedy1: Avoid walking barefoot in sandy or contaminated areas
column9: Keep the skin clean and dry

Description: Chickenpox is a viral infection that causes an itchy rash with red spots and fluid-filled blisters.
Remedy1: Avoid close contact with infected individuals
column8: Apply calamine lotion or take oatmeal baths to relieve itching

Description: Shingles is a viral infection that causes a painful rash with blisters
Precaution1: typically occurring in a band on one side of the body.
Remedy1: Avoid contact with individuals who have not had chickenpox or the chickenpox vaccine
column8: Apply cool compresses and take pain relievers as recommended
